text: Munyuma yaho haciye hasubirirwa n’urundi runganwe rubi cane rwatoranye ibisigi vy’igitabu batoramwo ivyabujijwe vyo ng’aha kw’Isi bavuga bati:- twebwe tuzogirirwa ikigongwe n’ibindi nk’ibi nivyadushikira navyone tuzovyakira, mbega ntibagiriwe amasezerano yomu gitabu yuko batazo vuga amajambo bayegeka ku Mana atari ukuri gusa, nabo bakaba baramaze gusoma ibiri muri ico gitabu, n’inzu yo mw’ijuru izobabera nziza muri bamwe batinya Imana yabo y’ukuri, mbega mwebwe ntimutegera
